transcript: almost nothing in business is urgent as much as it feels like it even if like I would say the worst case thing that can happen is that you can't process money cuz that's like the lifeblood of business you can't Bank in 12 hours like you can still figure it out on a good night's sleep and make better decisions and the quality difference between the moment of being angry and 12 hours later well rested the delta in your decision-making quality more than makes up for the latency in your reaction
